Dialogue: You're leaving? But what about Ms. Karen's sermon later?
She'll be mad if you don't do what you're told . . .
You really are determined to leave, huh?
As long as you're back before the sermon starts, I guess you'll be fine.
You should take your watch with you when you go. Just be back before the sermon.
She said it'll be at 9:30. We'll all have to clean the floors again if you get in trouble!
Be sure to come back, alright.
